title: Photo Equipment Rental
description: E-Do Studio provides a wide range of professional photographic equipment for your projects. Whether you're an independent photographer, an agency, or a brand, our rental service gives you access to high-end, perfectly maintained equipment suitable for all types of shoots.

equipment_categories.title: Lenses
items: Sony FE 90mm f/2.8 Macro G OSS
Phase One Schneider Kreuznach 80mm LS f/2.8

steps.title: Reservation
steps.description: Contact us to check availability and reserve your equipment

steps.title: Pickup
steps.description: Collect your equipment at our studio or opt for delivery

steps.title: Return
steps.description: Return the equipment on the agreed date or request an extension

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.content: Our rental service allows you to access high-end equipment without major investment. You benefit from expert advice to choose the most suitable equipment for your project, and total flexibility in the rental duration.
